subject: Re: Updates to product pages across AU, UK and GLOBAL site

full_threads.body:

Confirming we have updated the pages below: 
https://acoufelt.com.au/solution/full-color-acoustic-ceiling-tiles/

action.text: Heath Maguire assigned to Joel Maligalig

full_threads.body:
Thanks Heath,

Have had Karina review and have a few more tweaks -

CEILING TILES

https://acoufelt.com.au/solution/full-color-acoustic-ceiling-tiles/

https://acoufelt.global/solution/full-color-acoustic-ceiling-tiles/

On both these page can we please add V30 as an option in the 'Choose your tile' section, and add the related paragraph too.

FilaSorb V30 is a high performance architectural engineered acoustic panel. The V in V30 refers the technology used to construct the tight, vertical structure of fibers, resulting in a world-leading lightweight material of structural integrity, guaranteed to retain a rigid form in ceiling applications. Made in Australia using over 80% recycled material, V30 panels achieve an NRC up to 0.85, and are offered in a wide range of colour and design options.



Please also add FilaSorb V30 to the colorway accordion here:



Rest is good.

BAFFLES

https://acoufelt.co.uk/solution/quietspan-acoustic-ceiling-baffle/

Can we please add the colorway accordion for FilaSorb 22 here (don't need to add the table etc, just the 3 x FilaSorb 22 colorways)



Thanks heaps!

Lucy Pittman

Marketing Manager



T +61 1800 626 462 • M +61 414 167 790

Australia Square - Suite 2, Level 43, 264 George Street, Sydney NSW 2000

acoufelt.com

Thanks so much Heath will review all again and let you know if there's anything further 😊

By the way, Keenan asked me to flag with you progress on the new Quiethive web page? The launch is next week and no doubt there might be some finessing required (plus we'd like to test the function of the booking form too) if you wouldn't mind jumping onto this one next?

Otherwise let us know when you expect to have this complete by.

Thanks!

Lucy Pittman

Marketing Manager



T +61 1800 626 462 • M +61 414 167 790

Australia Square - Suite 2, Level 43, 264 George Street, Sydney NSW 2000

Hi Lucy, 

Apologies for the back and forth on this one. Have you got some time this afternoon to work through it with me?

@rica @jaime Let's review this before we do anything else, this is not great feedback from the client. We need to understand what went wrong. I will call you both later this afternoon, I have a few meetings to attend beforehand,

action.text: Rica Rosario Valencia assigned to Jaime Velasquez

full_threads.body:
Hi Rica,

Honestly overall we are a bit unimpressed with the updates. We ask that you please follow instructions closely and ask questions if you have any, and make sure work is checked before it's sent back.

The below needs fixing please:

https://acoufelt.global/solution/full-color-acoustic-ceiling-panel/

Please check the following:



And none of these spec sheets are loading. 404 error page. I have reattached these for you.

https://acoufelt.com.au/solution/full-color-acoustic-ceiling-panel/

These downloads aren't loading. 404 error page. I have reattached these for you.

https://acoufelt.co.uk/solution/full-color-ceiling-panel/

Circled files aren't loading and 30mm needs to be removed.



Please move the +/-10% to the END of the thicknesses.

https://acoufelt.com.au/solution/full-color-acoustic-ceiling-tiles/

Please see comments below as the 'Select your tile' table and 12, 22 and V30 colorways haven't been added.

Please move the +/-10% to the END of the thicknesses.

https://acoufelt.global/solution/full-color-acoustic-ceiling-tiles/

Change to 22



There is also a double up of colorways below?



Move the +/-10% to the end

https://acoufelt.co.uk/solution/full-color-ceiling-tiles/

Double up of colorways



There is only one spec sheet. Can we also get the 22mm spec sheet loaded up here to match the others?

https://acoufelt.global/solution/opus-wall-panels/

remove all of this - opus only available in 12mm.



Remove 33mm and add +/-10%

https://acoufelt.global/solution/weave-fabric-wrapped-acoustic-panel/ revert changes back to please match Au page: https://acoufelt.com.au/solution/weave-fabric-wrapped-acoustic-panel/

https://acoufelt.global/solution/acoustic-ceiling-baffles/ and https://acoufelt.com.au/solution/acoustic-ceiling-baffles/

Change from FilaSorb to FilaSorb 12



Thanks,

Lucy Pittman

Marketing Manager



T +61 1800 626 462 • M +61 414 167 790

Australia Square - Suite 2, Level 43, 264 George Street, Sydney NSW 2000

action.text: Rica Rosario Valencia assigned to Jaime Velasquez

full_threads.body:
Hi Rica,

These are a fair few problems we're noticing already…

Of most importance (and urgency) is you've made some unnecessary changes to the 'Weave' page - which we are sending out this THURSDAY morning in an eDM.

https://acoufelt.com.au/solution/weave-fabric-wrapped-acoustic-panel/

We never requested to add the additional table, paragraphs and thicknesses to this page (12m and 22mm?).



Can you please revert the AU Weave page to how it was before? My only request was to add the new colorways to the GLOBAL weave page, to match the AU page. (https://acoufelt.com/global/solution/weave-fabric-wrapped-acoustic-panel/)

Please make this change ASAP.

I'll come back to you with the rest of our feedback shortly.

Thanks

Lucy Pittman

Marketing Manager

Australia Square - Suite 2, Level 43, 264 George Street, Sydney NSW 2000
